titleStmt.title: Hinds elder brother, or the master thief discovered being a notable pithy relation of the life of Major Thomas Knowls his many exploits escapes, and witty robberies.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: The second "1" in the imprint is crossed out and date altered to 1652; "Jan. 30th."; "1652".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
